title: Removing a working set immediately causes changes to be made
description: When removing a working set, changes are immediately made instead of waiting for confirmation.
OB: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view is filtered. 2.
EB: At the moment of delete, the package view in the background should not immediately refilter. Refiltering should only happen when closing the working set selection dialog, not while manipulating it. Additionally, pressing cancel should cancel all changes made to working sets, including cancelling the removal of the working set.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. 2. Attempt to remove the working set and observe the package view.
